name: EG237T Paint Roller

A comfort that last for long tedious jobs. Handles allow for the best quality control with exceptional results. name: Xpert 10 IN 1 Husk

This is a multi purpose tool and is ideal for home improvement projects like applying joint compound, puttying windows, scraping paint, removing loose putty, removing loose paint, removing vinyl or paper wall covering, Patching dents cracks holes in plaster with soft grip designed to last for long jobs without hand discomfort.
